name: Bachelorette Challenge
description:
Bachelorette Challenge … from the makers of the popular SEXY SLANG board games … a hilarious game of dares & cocktails that will keep the girls laughing all night long!

With 40 wild bar challenges, the bachelorette and her entourage will have their hands full, interacting with “bar boys” and earning points along the way.

Sexy Slang’s Bachelorette Challenge includes 20 picture and 20 word challenges.

The Sexy Slang Picture Challenges 
The odd numbered challenges are fun pictures of Sexy Slang terms like “ONE EYED TROUSER SNAKE.” The bachelorette (or one of her girls) must approach a boy at the bar and ask him to guess the term.

If the bar boy guesses correctly, the bachelorette earns a point and the girls move on to the next challenge. If he does not guess correctly, then the bachelorette must drink.

  Sexy Slang Word Challenges
 The even-numbered challenges give a fun definition of a Sexy Slang term and then dare the bachelorette to approach a bar boy and do something related to that term. For example, the bachelorette may ask funny questions, perform wild stunts, or perhaps do a little flirting.  See the “Naughty” screen shot to the left for one of the “tamer” terms.  You never know what you might learn during these challenges!!
  Not Just for the Bachelorette
 Challenges are created for the bachelorette; however, through the course of the night, she is allowed to “tag” girls in her entourage up to ten times to take one for the team and perform the challenge.

Cocktails
 Designed to be played in a bar or club, Sexy Slang’s Bachelorette Challenge goes well with cocktails. Besides the drink requirements, there are “Social” drink opportunities interspersed throughout the game.

Rules
 The only real rule is to make the bachelorette laugh and have a great time!
